headline.main: A Western Front: Is Iraq Next?

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''Defectors Cite Iraqi Training for Terrorism'' (front page, Nov. 8) reports that the discovery of an Iraqi training camp for terrorists is being considered in Washington as a possible reason for extending the war against the Taliban to include Iraq. It must be pointed out that up to now Congress has limited the president's use of force to organizations or people connected to the Sept. 11 attacks.
abstract: Francis Dummer Fisher letter opposes extending war against terrorism to Iraq despite reports of Iraqi training camps for terrorists (Nov 8 article), saying Congress has limited use of US force to organizations or people connected with Sept 11 attacks
